cards.name: Audit
cards.description: This DeFi protocol cannot be targeted by an exploit.

cards.name: Bridge Hack
cards.description: Destroy target chain and all DeFi Protocols on it.

cards.name: Study the charts
cards.description: Draw 2 cards.

cards.name: 1inch
cards.description: Gain 1 ETH per other DeFi attached to the same chain.

cards.name: CoW Swap
cards.description: Gain 1 ETH per other DeFi attached to the same chain.

cards.name: Yield Farm
cards.description: Enters with 3 tokens. Each turn remove 1 token and add 2 ETH.

cards.name: (3, 3) Protocol
cards.description: DVolatile. Gain 3 ETH per turn per ETH stored here.

cards.name: Memecoin Launch
cards.description: Volatile. Each turn adds 1 ETH. Sacrifice this to gain 2 ETH per counter.

cards.name: Phishing Attack
cards.description: Steal 3 ETH from a target wallet.

cards.name: Algorithmic Stablecoin
cards.description: Volatile. Generates 1 ETH per turn. Draw 1 card per turn.

cards.name: Optimisim
cards.description: Generates 1 ETH per turn.

cards.name: Balancer
cards.description: Gain 1 ETH per turn per ETH stored here.

cards.name: Protocol Hack
cards.description: Destroy target DeFi protocol.

cards.name: Flash Loan
cards.description: Gain 10 ETH. Repay 10 ETH next turn.

cards.name: Chainlink
cards.description: Gain 1 ETH per turn per chain you control. Does not die if a chain it is connected to is destroyed.

cards.name: Multisig Compromise
cards.description: Destroy target chain.

cards.name: RugPull
cards.description: Destroy target DeFi protocol. Take  ETH from opponent.

cards.name: Fluid
cards.description: Gain 1 ETH per turn per ETH stored here.

cards.name: Attend ETHGlobal
cards.description: Add 1 ETH to every DeFi protocol you control.

cards.name: DeFi Llama Research
cards.description: Draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Altcoin Validator
cards.description: Gain 2 ETH every turn per ETH stored here.

cards.name: Secret Key Leak
cards.description: Steal up to 3 ETH from a target wallet.

cards.name: Attend a Conference
cards.description: Draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Rocketpool Validator
cards.description: Gain 1 ETH every turn per ETH stored here.

cards.name: Jito
cards.description: Gain 1 ETH every turn.

cards.name: Flashbots
cards.description: Gain 1 ETH every turn.

cards.name: Lido
cards.description: Gain 1 ETH per ETH stored here.

cards.name: Invalid OP-Code
cards.description: Target opponent discards a card.

cards.name: Lost Keys
cards.description: Target wallet loses all of its ETH.

cards.name: Validator Cluster
cards.description: Gain 2 ETH every turn.

cards.name: Flow
cards.description: Generates 1 ETH per turn.

cards.name: Jupiter
cards.description: Gain 2 ETH every turn.

cards.name: Curve
cards.description: Gain 1 ETH per ETH stored here.

cards.name: Ethena
cards.description: Gain 3 ETH every turn.

cards.name: Pendle
cards.description: Gain 1 ETH per ETH stored here.

cards.name: Aave
cards.description: Gain 2 ETH per turn per ETH stored here.

cards.name: Arbitrum
cards.description: Generates 1 ETH per turn.

cards.name: Base
cards.description: Generates 1 ETH per turn.

cards.name: Morpho
cards.description: Gain 1 ETH per turn per ETH stored here.

cards.name: Insurance
cards.description: This chain and all DeFi protocols on it can't be destroyed.

cards.name: Crypto Whale
cards.description: Add 1 ETH per DeFi governance control.

cards.name: Fork
cards.description: Copy target DeFi protocol you control.

cards.name: Wormhole
cards.description: If you control 2+ Chains, gain 2 ETH per turn per ETH stored here (max +2 ETH/turn).

cards.name: Re-entrant Attack
cards.description: Destroy target DeFi protocol.

cards.name: 51% Attack
cards.description: Take control of target Chain.

cards.name: Wallet
cards.description: Place max 5 ETH here.

cards.name: Dune Research
cards.description: Draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Polygon
cards.description: Gain 1 ETH per turn.

cards.name: Uniswap
cards.description: Gain 1 ETH per turn per ETH stored here.

cards.name: Validator Node
cards.description: Gain 1 ETH every turn.

cards.name: Read a Whitepaper
cards.description: Draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Gas War
cards.description: Each opponent pays 1 ETH upkeep on their turn.

cards.name: Diamond Hands
cards.description: ETH in this wallet can't be removed by opponents.

cards.name: Force Sell
cards.description: Target opponent loses 2 ETH from one of their wallets.

cards.name: EIP-1559 Burn
cards.description: Burn 1 ETH from each opponent. Then gain 1 ETH.

cards.name: Vitalik Tweet
cards.description: All players draw 1 card. You gain 1 ETH.

cards.name: DAO Hack
cards.description: Destroy up to 2 opponent DeFi on a single Chain.

cards.name: NFT Rugpull
cards.description: Target opponent loses 3 ETH.

cards.name: Pump and Dump
cards.description: Gain 6 ETH now. Lose 3 ETH at the start of your next turn.

cards.name: Sandwich Attack
cards.description: Once per turn, when an opponent plays an Action, steal 1 ETH from them.

cards.name: Front-Run Bot
cards.description: Once per turn, when an opponent plays an Action, gain 1 ETH.

cards.name: Rollup Wars
cards.description: Choose a Chain you control. It produces +1 ETH per turn.

cards.name: Liquidation Cascade
cards.description: Destroy all opponent wallets with 4+ ETH.

cards.name: Ragequit
cards.description: Destroy one of your DeFi. Gain 5 ETH.

cards.name: Ape FOMO
cards.description: You may draw 3 cards. If you do, lose 2 ETH.

cards.name: Hard Fork
cards.description: Create a temporary Chain token that generates 1 ETH per turn for 2 turns.

cards.name: Soft Fork
cards.description: Until your next turn, opponent Actions cost +1 ETH.

cards.name: Bridge Exploit
cards.description: Steal 3 ETH from an opponent's Chain.

cards.name: Sharding
cards.description: Your Chains generate +1 ETH per turn.

cards.name: Slashing
cards.description: Target opponent loses 2 ETH for each Validator Node they control.

cards.name: Governance Vote
cards.description: Draw 2 cards. Each opponent discards 1 card.

cards.name: Testnet
cards.description: Play this Chain for free. It disappears after 2 of your turns.

cards.name: Gas Fee Spike
cards.description: This turn, opponent Actions cost +1 ETH.

cards.name: Diamond DAO
cards.description: Gain 1 ETH per DeFi you control.

cards.name: Oracles
cards.description: Once per turn, when you gain ETH, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Time Bomb Stablecoin
cards.description: Gain 5 ETH now. At the end of your 3rd turn after this, lose 5 ETH unless this is destroyed.

cards.name: Dust Attack
cards.description: Target opponent wallet can't receive ETH for 2 turns.

cards.name: Exit Scam
cards.description: Destroy one of your DeFi. Gain 8 ETH.

cards.name: Liquidity Mining
cards.description: Draw 1 card per DeFi you control (max 3).

cards.name: MEV Extractor
cards.description: Once per turn, when an opponent gains ETH, steal 1 ETH from them.

cards.name: Ponzinomics
cards.description: Gain 4 ETH now. Lose 2 ETH at the start of your next turn.

cards.name: Proof of Work
cards.description: Exhaust up to 2 opponent EOAs for 1 turn (they produce 0).

cards.name: Proof of Stake
cards.description: If at least 1 ETH is stored here, gain 2 ETH per turn.

cards.name: Gasless Transaction
cards.description: This turn, you may play one Action for free.

cards.name: Auditor
cards.description: Destroy target opponent DeFi with cost 3 or less.

cards.name: Bug Bounty
cards.description: Draw 2 cards. If an opponent destroyed one of your cards last turn, gain 2 ETH.

cards.name: Multi-sig Wallet
cards.description: Storage max 8. The first time each turn this would be stolen from or destroyed, prevent it.

cards.name: Cold Storage
cards.description: Storage max 10. ETH newly placed here can't be targeted by Actions for 2 turns.

cards.name: Mini Flash Loan
cards.description: Gain 4 ETH for this turn. At end of turn, repay 4 ETH or destroy one of your DeFi.

cards.name: Yield Aggregator
cards.description: This turn, your DeFi with yield/income produce +1 ETH.

cards.name: Sequencer Outage
cards.description: Choose a Chain. It produces 0 ETH next turn.
